citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 415-450 pm
on 07-MAR-17. Inspector arrived at 415 pm and found locked gate across deriveway. Called facility home phone
number with no answer at 423 pm . Called cell phone number and left message at 426 pm. Inspector waited until
445 pm before leaving facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 415-450 pm
on 07-MAR-17. Inspector arrived at 415 pm and found locked gate across deriveway.  Called facility home phone
number with no answer at 423 pm .  Called cell phone number and left message at 426 pm.   Inspector waited until
445 pm before leaving facility.
